title: Chicken Nachos with Ranchitas Natural
ingredients: 1/2 cup mozzarella or cheddar cheese (for melting).
instructions: Step 1. Heat the oil in a skillet and sauté the chicken. While cooking, season with salt and pepper.
Step 2. Add the chopped garlic, ketchup, and water.
Step 3. Cook gently until the chicken has a slightly saucy texture.
Step 4. Place Ranchitas Natural on a plate, then add a portion of chicken on top.
Step 5. Sprinkle cheese on top and microwave until melted. Remove and top with jalapeño, cilantro, tomato, and bacon.
